CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices

Class CompanyWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.CompanyWebService

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="REST/CompanyWebService")
public class CompanyWebService
extends java.lang.Object

    Company Web Service

    This Class is function as a "wrapper" REST API Controller of the CompanyServiceImpl.class This Class describe all the Functions that the Company allowed in the system. Each Function Has is one Path Which Can be Apply by the Client (Company).
